quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Your body can stand almost anything. It’s your mind that you have to convince.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Success starts with self-discipline.
author: Unknown

quote: Good things come to those who sweat.
author: Unknown

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

quote: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
author: Unknown

quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown

quote: Little by little, a little becomes a lot.
author: Unknown

quote: A one-hour workout is 4% of your day. No excuses.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
author: Jack LaLanne

quote: Sweat is fat crying.
author: Unknown

quote: Strength does not come from the physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Your health account, your bank account, they're the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out.
author: Jack LaLanne

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside of you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Success isn’t always about greatness. It’s about consistency. Consistent hard work gains success. Greatness will come.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: The only way to define your limits is by going beyond them.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: There is no glory in practice, but without practice, there is no glory.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wish for a good body, work for it.
author: Unknown

quote: Discipline is doing what needs to be done, even if you don’t want to do it.
author: Unknown

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.
author: Fred DeVito

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If you still look good at the end of your workout, you didn’t train hard enough.
author: Unknown

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.
author: Unknown

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Fitness is like a relationship. You can’t cheat and expect it to work.
author: Unknown

quote: The pain of today is the victory of tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s going to be a journey. It’s not a sprint to get in shape.
author: Kerri Walsh Jennings

quote: No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch.
author: Unknown

quote: No pain, no gain. Shut up and train.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown

quote: Train insane or remain the same.
author: Unknown

quote: You are much stronger than you think.
author: Unknown

quote: The only limit is the one you set yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: When you feel like quitting think about why you started.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s not about having time. It’s about making time.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wait for inspiration, be the inspiration.
author: Unknown

quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

quote: Exercise is a celebration of what your body can do. Not a punishment for what you ate.
author: Unknown

quote: When you feel like stopping think about why you started.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Sweat now, shine later.
author: Unknown

quote: You are stronger than you think.
author: Unknown

quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s not about having time, it’s about making time.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t find willpower, you create it.
author: Unknown

quote: Exercise in the morning before your brain figures out what you’re doing.
author: Unknown

quote: You are what you do, not what you say you’ll do.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no ‘I’ll start tomorrow.’ Tomorrow is disease.
author: V.L. Allineare

quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: I always believed if you take care of your body it will take care of you.
author: Ted Lindsay

quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else, it’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Unknown

quote: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Your health is an investment, not an expense.
author: Unknown

quote: Once you are exercising regularly, the hardest thing is to stop it.
author: Erin Gray

quote: Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
author: Joseph Pilates

quote: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: What fits your busy schedule better, exercising one hour a day or being dead 24 hours a day?
author: Randy Glasbergen
